message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers exceptional value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the item, but I'm looking to stay within a budget of $100. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $100?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $150 is already a very competitive price for this item.  Could you meet me halfway at $125?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I would like to stick to my original request if possible. Would it be feasible to reduce the price to $100?
